Index.title: Next Terminal
Index.subtitle: Analyze financial data more effectively with intuitive data visualization and AI-powered chatbot.

Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: All-in-one solution for market data analysis and AI-driven insights

realTimeData.title: Real-time Data Visualization
realTimeData.description: Get real-time data from FRED, Alpha Vantage, and more displayed in intuitive charts.

chatbotAssistant.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
chatbotAssistant.description: Ask questions about data in natural language and receive immediate answers.

customDashboard.title: Customizable Dashboard
customDashboard.description: Add and arrange widgets to create a personalized dashboard.

Demo.title: AI-Powered Data Analysis
Demo.subtitle: Easily understand and analyze complex financial data

Ticker.title: Search for Stock Symbols
Ticker.searchPlaceholder: Search for a stock (e.g., AAPL, Microsoft)

yieldCurve.title: Current Yield Curve
yieldCurve.label: Is it inverted?
yieldCurve.action: First, can you help me find the relevant treasury yield indicators in FRED? Then analyze the current yield curve and tell me if it's inverted or not. What does this suggest about the economy?

inflation.title: Inflation Trend
inflation.label: CPI and core inflation
inflation.action: Can you search for CPI and core inflation indicators in FRED? Then show me the recent inflation trends over the past 12 months. Are inflation rates increasing or decreasing?

stocks.title: Stock Performance
stocks.label: Top tech companies
stocks.action: Could you look up the stock performance of major tech companies like Apple, Microsoft, and Google using AlphaVantage? Which one has performed the best over the past 3 months?

economic.title: Economic Health Check
economic.label: GDP and unemployment
economic.action: Please help me find GDP growth rate and unemployment rate indicators in FRED. What do these indicators tell us about the current state of the economy?
